# conjur_group (Resource)

Conjur Group resource. This resource creates a group in Conjur using policy. Note that this is a write-only resource - import and exact state tracking are not supported due to API limitations.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "conjur_group" "my_group" {
  name    = "my-group"
  branch = "data/terraform"
  annotations = {
    description = "Group managed by Terraform",
    environment = "development"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `branch` (String) The policy branch of the group
- `name` (String) The name of the group

### Optional

- `annotations` (Map of String) Key-value annotations for the group
- `owner` (Attributes) Owner of the group (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--owner))

<a id="nestedatt--owner"></a>
### Nested Schema for `owner`

Optional:

- `id` (String) Owner identifier
- `kind` (String) Owner kind (user, group, etc.)
